text: Look at how the Chinese are making thousands of dollars. They have developed a unique pumpkin farming technique to produce the world's largest pumpkin that not a single man can carry alone. But also they have developed the smallest pumpkins in the size of a hand. But look at this tamarind fruit that looks awkward, but it's so delicious. All are sold for high prices. But...

segments.text: Look at how the Chinese are making thousands of dollars.
They have developed a unique pumpkin farming technique
to produce the world's largest pumpkin that not a single man can carry alone.
But also they have developed the smallest pumpkins in the size of a hand.
But look at this tamarind fruit that looks awkward, but it's so delicious.
All are sold for high prices.
